Package SuperEasyShare.entities

Class LongTermRate

  • java.lang.Object
    • SuperEasyShare.entities.Rate
      • SuperEasyShare.entities.LongTermRate
  • public class LongTermRate
extends Rate
    A rate intended for long term rental in the car sharing system.
    This long term rate is based on a base duration (in days) for which a certain base amount is charged. For each additional day an additional fee is charged.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int baseAmount
      The base amount in euro cents for this long term rate.
      This is the amount charged for any rental not exceeding the base duration.
      private int baseDuration
      The base duration of this long term rate in days.
      Minimum is one day, default is 5.
      private int perDay
      The per day rate of this long term rate in cents/day.
      This is the amount charged per day for any rental time in excess of the base duration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LongTermRate​(int baseAmount, int perDay)
      Constructs a long term rate instance with specific base amount and day rate.
      Illegal arguments are ignored.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String toString()
      Creates a textual description of this long term rate.
      Includes all attributes.
      int total​(Trip t)
      Calculates the total of this long term rate.
      The total is the base amount plus the per day rate for any additional day exceeding the base duration.

      • Methods declared in class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • baseDuration

        private int baseDuration
        The base duration of this long term rate in days.
        Minimum is one day, default is 5.

      • baseAmount

        private int baseAmount
        The base amount in euro cents for this long term rate.
        This is the amount charged for any rental not exceeding the base duration. Default is 25000

      • perDay

        private int perDay
        The per day rate of this long term rate in cents/day.
        This is the amount charged per day for any rental time in excess of the base duration. Default is 7000

    • Constructor Detail

      • LongTermRate

        public LongTermRate​(int baseAmount,
                    int perDay)
        Constructs a long term rate instance with specific base amount and day rate.
        Illegal arguments are ignored.
        Parameters:
        baseAmount - the case amount in cents
        perDay - the per day rate in cents/day

    • Method Detail

      • total

        public int total​(Trip t)
        Calculates the total of this long term rate.
        The total is the base amount plus the per day rate for any additional day exceeding the base duration. The total is only calculated if the trip is completed, otherwise zero is returned.
        Specified by:
        total in class Rate
        Parameters:
        t - the trip for which the total amount is to be calculated
        Returns:
        the total amount or zero, if the trip is not completed
        See Also:
        Rate.total(SuperEasyShare.entities.Trip)
